name: ProChain
title: Retail System & Distribution
description: ProChain is a retail system owned by Dimata IT Solution. Made for handling stock counting and distribution. Provides records of item distribution flow from receive documents to sales report. Designed for many kind of retail business such as shop, restaurant, warehouse, etc.
role: Develop the system for additional features based on client's requirements.
Maintain the system to provides valid data for reporting.

name: Hanoman Outlet
title: Reservation & Schedule Management
description: Hanoman Outlet is a booking system owned by Dimata IT Solution. It shows information about available room and person-in-charge at specific time for service products. This information is used to create schedule for treatment. It also provides the ability to manage the reservation process from the start to the end of the treatment. It is currently designed for spa business.
role: Make sure the system provides valid information for available treatment.
Design the system to be able to manage treatment schedule.

name: Sedana
title: Savings & Loan Management System
description: Sedana is a savings and loan information system owned by Dimata IT Solution. This application helps micro-credit businesses to record loans and also savings for their customers. This application is made based on standard rules for the savings and loan business.
role: Designed the system to handle various kind of savings and loan requirements.
Provides feature to shows the flows of the transactions.
Make sure the system give the precise calculation result for the interest value since it manages money.

name: D-Cashier
title: Billing & Payment System
description: D-Cashier is a system for making payments for retail businesses owned by Dimata IT Solution. This system work together with ProChain for handling the selling process of items. It provides information about all items and their prices and count the tax and service if avalable. Not only for making payments, it also can make bill for return item or even split the bills for many kind of reason.
role: Develop the system for additional features based on client's requirements.
Make sure the system can handle the counting process correctly so it can provide the valid data to create a balance journals for the accountants.

name: InTans
title: Tax Calculation & Tapping System
description: InTans is a tax calculation system owned by Dimata IT Solution. It has the ability to collect transaction data automatically from local businesses and deliver it to the local government to be calculated. This system is made for businesses that potentially produce taxes to the local governments such as hotel and restaurant.
role: Designed the system to collect data automatically.
Connect the system between local business and the local government.
Provide report of the tax revenue for the local government.

name: Hairisma
title: Human Resource Management System
description: Hairisma is an HR management system owned by Dimata IT Solution. It helps user to manage employees data including employees attendance, paid leave and salary calculation. This system provides feature for creating formulas for salary calculation based on various type of parameters and also provide customs reports for it.
role: Develop additional features and report based on client's requirements.
